thread.title: Los Angeles Police Chief to Retire

author: Zusha Elinson
title: Los Angeles Police Chief to Retire

organizations.name: los angeles police chief to retire los angeles police

text:
Los Angeles Police Chief Charlie Beck announced his retirement Friday after eight years at the helm of the police department for the nation’s second-largest city.
Mr. Beck, who is 64 years old and maintained Los Angeles’s relatively low violent crime rates and boosted community policing efforts, said he would retire effective June 27.
